utilities package

Submodules

utilities.data_gen module

This is just a quick script to help me automatise translating the table information into Python.

utilities.data_gen.gen_data()[source]

utilities.update module

This module allows for automatic updates to the file paths specified in paths.json5

utilities.update.update_config()[source]

Run a series of queries asking user to specify configuration parameters.

utilities.update.update_path()[source]

Run a series of queries asking user to specify valid paths to input files.
